thread.title: Beverly Hills’ Kyle Richards: I’d “Rather Not” if Kellyanne Conway Becomes a Real Housewife
thread.title_full: Beverly Hills’ Kyle Richards: I’d “Rather Not” if Kellyanne Conway Becomes a Real Housewife

author: Jason Pham
title: Beverly Hills’ Kyle Richards: I’d “Rather Not” if Kellyanne Conway Becomes a Real Housewife
text:
February 26, 2017 by Jason Pham 0 Shares Advertisement 
The Real Housewives of Washington D.C. won't be a thing again if Kyle Richards has anything to do with it. 
The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star is completely rejecting the idea of President Donald Trump 's right-hand woman, Kellyanne Conway, coming on board. 
The conversation was brought up after Real Housewives producer Andy Cohen revealed on Late Night with Seth Meyers that he had been courting the White House aficionado to star in his franchise. 
“I’ve been saying for a year – I’ve been calling all the debates Housewives reunions, because they were,” Andy said. “There are parallels to Housewives and a lot of things that happened during the election. There are so many.” 
Not having it, Kyle couldn't keep quiet. When a TMZ reporter told her about Andy's plan, she replied, "Oh, please!" 
The reporter then asked if she thought Trump's former campaign manager would be a good fit. She replied, laughing, "I don't know. Which Housewives ?" Embed from Getty Images 
The reality star then clarified that she thinks Andy is obiviously joking and Kellyanne won't be coming anywhere near the Housewives empire. 
"I think that's obviously a joke. I don't think Andy wants anything to do with any of that," she said. 
The reporter reasoned that Kellyanne is good at handling conflict so she'd make a great addition to the Housewives . 
Not believing it, Kyle gave some side eye and responded, "Is she?" 
via GIPHY 
Knowing where her mouth gets her, that's when the Bravo star started to get skittish. 
"I'm going to leave it at that because I'm going to get myself in very big trouble," she said. "I think you could file that under the more ridiculous rumors with the Housewives ." 
Then the real question, would she work with her? She hesitated answering with a big umm but eventually gave her 2 cents. 
"I'd rather not," she said with a big laugh. 
Comment below if you think Kellyanne Conway would be a good fit for the Housewives .
